Subject : your opinion /experience on i3 Test Drive Program
Dear Sir/Madam,
I would like to contact you concerning a research project dealing with customer education customer participation for adopting new product
My name is Kamel Ben Youssef and I'm a Professor at the University of Paris Nanterre (France, see my CV : http://www.parisnanterre.fr/m-kamel-ben-youssef--698795.kjs… ) and a visiting professor at the University of Turin (Italy). My research interests have to do with design, marketing and CSR branding.
This is why I would like to ask you kindly if you could reply to this (short) questionnaire (only 5 questions) about BMW i3 Test Drive Program: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1AQSF1pvyC-SgcAtk5MxRqt9EBp6Qm90eWQTXsjJn5No/edit 
Thank you for your cooperation
Best regards
Kamel

17.post_text:
Hi everyone, my name is Victor and I am a BMW Genius with Performance Motors.

Have a question about the all-new BMW iPerformance, a range of BMW plug-in hybrids? Join me in this live Facebook Q&A session happening right now till 5pm on 7 Oct 2017 and I will be answering all of your questions.

Simply ask a question regarding the new BMW plug-in hybrids in the comments section below and you could be one of the 10 lucky winners to walk away with a BMW Card Game or BMW Cap.

#AskABMWGenius #iPerformance

comments.message: Thank you all for your questions regarding the all-new BMW iPerformance range! Hope my answers have been helpful. The 10 lucky winners, who will walk away with either the BMW Card Game or BMW Cap, will be contacted via Facebook PM by 10 Oct 2017. ~Victor
Is your hybrid range as problematic as your gasoline range? Currently I own 1 of the gasoline models and I was very disappointed with the quality and reliability!

How many hours or minutes each time charge take 
and how much it cost per charge ?
What is range for pure electric? How many batteries inside?

BMW style and design still the best

I heard hybrid card braking Dynamics is poor. Any comments?
We love to upgrade sound system in our car, example powerful amplifier. Will is affect the Hybrid car battery and performance ?
If I travel about 30km a day, at 90km/h, how often do you reckon I will need to charge it?

Hi Victor 
May I ask for new condo under construction how to get the developer to arrange to install the charger or iWallbox 
do so now or upon TOP or till MCST is form?

22.post_text:
Thank you all who joined us at our BMW iPerformance official launch last weekend (30 Sep and 1 Oct 2017)!
 
We hope you enjoyed the exciting activities such as the hourly Slot Track challenge and Robotics Coding workshops by In3labs Robotics Coding, as well as the delectable treats by Loco Loco, Abbie's Coffeehouse, The Raclette Factory, and Central Perk SG.
 
You can still experience our range of 5 BMW plug-in hybrids at Performance Motors and for a limited time only, enjoy exclusive deals and gifts such as complimentary charging for 10 years with your purchase of the all-new BMW iPerformance. Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 to book a test drive today.
